title: Multi-Platform Webhook Triggers

problem.en: An internal agent only provides value when its workflows are initiated. Building out trigger mechanisms is core to agent adoption. Without easy triggers, employees can't effectively automate workflows.
problem.ko: 내부 에이전트는 워크플로우가 시작될 때만 가치를 제공합니다. 트리거 메커니즘 구축이 에이전트 채택의 핵심입니다. 쉬운 트리거 없이는 직원들이 워크플로우를 효과적으로 자동화할 수 없습니다.

solution.en: Implement multi-platform webhook triggers: Notion webhooks for document changes, Slack messages/reacji, Jira issue events, and scheduled events via cron or GitHub Actions.
solution.ko: 다중 플랫폼 웹훅 트리거 구현: 문서 변경용 Notion 웹훅, Slack 메시지/이모지 반응, Jira 이슈 이벤트, cron 또는 GitHub Actions를 통한 예약 이벤트.

mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD
    A[Notion Webhook] --> E[Agent Trigger]
    B[Slack Message/Reacji] --> E
    C[Jira Issue Event] --> E
    D[Scheduled Cron] --> E
    E --> F[Workflow Execution]
    F --> G[Results/Actions]
code_example:
# Trigger configuration
notion_triggers:
  - database: 'RFC Database'
    event: 'page_updated'
    filter: 'status.draft → status.ready_for_review'
    workflow: 'assign_reviewers'

slack_reacji:
  - emoji: ':jira:'
    scope: 'any_channel'
    workflow: 'thread_to_ticket'

scheduled_triggers:
  - cron: '0 9 * * MON'
    workflow: 'weekly_standup_prep'
    via: 'github_actions'
